name: The End o,,,o
description:
You can only walk, jump and use fire
to avoid death and find your way back home.

All assets custom made.
With sound and varying background music.
17 game world screens.
5 simple riddles.
3 bosses.
13 colors.
3 FPS.
Challenging controls.

Initially designed for C64.
Then developed as a scripted object inside of an online virtual world.
But now ported to PC while staying true to most of the previous limitations.Accessibility Features and Anti-Features+/- All dialog text-only

+ All sound effects dispensable
+ No color differentiation required
+ High contrast text
- Some low contrast scenery
+ Mostly no time limits to read on-screen text
- Time limits to complete in-game tasks
+ In-game tutorial
+ Simple menu
- No alternative difficulty levels
- No controller support
- No remappable keyboard keys (Requires: w/up, a/left, s/down, d/right, space, escape)
